resources.string: Zarf\'18, the annual cultural festival organized by Zakir Hussain College of Enginering and Technology,Aligarh, AMU, will be held from 6th and 8th April,2018. Zarf\â€™18, is definitely going to be huge this year. One of the biggest cultural fests of Uttar Pradesh, Zarf\'18 will be a three days extravaganza holding various interesting events like music, drama, games and sports, technical events and much more. Zarf\'18 has attracted major sponsors and extensive media coverage over the years. The team of Zarf\'18 consists of student volunteers, event organisers, technical coordinator,discipline committee etc. who work to promote creativity and intellectualism, and it symbolizes a place to be together and celebrate. A lot of competitive events will be held throughout the two days of Zarf\'18. Competitions are held pre-dominantly in the genres of Music, Fine Arts, Indoor Sports, Film and Photography (Digital), Literature, Debating ,Quizzing and other cultural and technical events.
